text: Raj Kumar Chakraverty was a Member of the 1st National Assembly of Pakistan as a representative of East Pakistan. ==Career== Chakraverty was a Member of the Constituent Assembly of Pakistan. He spoke in the assembly for a secular constitution in Pakistan. ==References== Category:Pakistani MNAs 1947–1954 Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Raj Kumar Chakraverty
